cause: Engine overheating due to lubrication failure.
solution: 1. Validate Lubricant Levels: Check and service lubricant levels to ensure they meet 100% of the recommended specifications. 2. Monitor Engine Temperature: Install an auxiliary radiator to maintain engine temperature below 80% of its maximum operational threshold. 3. Implement Predictive Maintenance: Establish remote monitoring of engine operations to capture and address any deviations from optimal conditions early.
